name: 柯萊恩
objective:
本課程旨在進一步加強學生的口語表達溝通之能力，經由合宜的活動設計，如小組討論與英語談話情境的塑造，如面談，學生將獲得充分機會以演練聽講的技巧。
This course will present you with a bevy of conversational situations and provide practice, skills and techniques to enable development of oral language skills.  Each student will be asked to generate, sustain and participate in class conversations and language scenarios drawn from real life.  We will play a number of language games, sing songs, and present short skits which students will conceive and produce.  A final small group presentation will call upon students to engage in meaningful discourse around a theme selected by the class.
